metadata.name: Lustre #1
metadata.description:
Generative art collection capturing the beauty of lustrous textures.

6000px x 6000px | 300dpi

All pieces are 100% code generated in Python. The script uses many random parameters, such as the colour scheme, compositing behaviour or the placement, length and density of the lines. A lot of effort goes into ensuring the parameters fall in the predefined ranges that produce the most striking outputs.
